title: 【搬运】Huntington City Project | 亨廷顿市，最真实的mc都市之一
author: dog911
txt_content:
Introduction to the city 城市介绍

Huntington city is one of the most realistic and functional fictive city ever built in Minecraft. 
亨廷顿市是在minecraft中建成的最真实、最功能齐全的虚构城市之一
The project was started by two founders of the Esterlon Community Server, the famous Yazur and Manco in August 2014. Their goal; Do something bigger and better than their last city, Lapiz Point City that already got popular. After only 6 months of hard work, they recruited the best realistic city builders from around the world and those helped contributing to this project. With around 1000 builds so far all spread around 9k x 9k blocks city. More than 300 different homes were built as well as may other builds. Including diagonal cable bridges, roads, buildings and houses, the team tried to realize the impossible in Minecraft. The project is still unfinished. 


此项目的发起人是两位esterlon服务器创始人，yazur 和 manco。项目开始于2014年八月。他们的目标是：做一个比他们上个项目（lapiz point市）更大更好的城市。经过6个月的努力后，他们从世界各地招募到了一群最好的现代城市建筑师。至今已经有1000栋建筑散布在这个9000*9000大小的城市，300多个不一样的住宅和很多其他建筑被建造出来。其中包括垂直拉索桥，道路，楼房与房屋，建筑团队在minecraft中将不可能变成现实，此项目仍未完工。


Huntington City map by www.realismsociety.com,available for download here: www.planetminecraft.com/project/huntington-city-project-realistic-city-ecs/ 
亨廷顿市由TRS团队制作，主页地址 www.realismsociety.com
(不过他们的主页因为经费不足暂时停止运行了，真是令人唏嘘不已)
PMC页面地址www.planetminecraft.com/project/huntington-city-project-realistic-city-ecs/

百度网盘地址（完整存档，直接在save文件夹解压即可）https://pan.baidu.com/s/1AyP56CBl56sjOwvjuOPuuA

材质包地址 https://pan.baidu.com/s/1V7DEzgnk2Q7Ucei99ioBGQ

你也可以直接登陆TRS服务器在线查看
TRS服务器地址 mc.realismsociety.com
进入后输入 /httwarps 即可选择传送至亨廷顿市的传送点。
